de: Amendment No 1 to Supplemental Agreement between the Government of the Swiss Confederation and the International Bank for Reconstruction and Development and the International Development Association regarding the Government Debt and Risk Management Multi-Donor Trust Fund (Trust Fund No. TF072660, parallel to original Trust Fund No. TF071685)  - 23-08-2017 - Abkommen zwischen der Schweiz, vertreten durch das SECO, und der Weltbank betreffend des Treuhandfonds für den Abbau der Staatsschulden und die Bewältigung von Risiken
en: Amendment No 1 to Supplemental Agreement between the Government of the Swiss Confederation and the International Bank for Reconstruction and Development and the International Development Association regarding the Government Debt and Risk Management Multi-Donor Trust Fund (Trust Fund No. TF072660, parallel to original Trust Fund No. TF071685)  - 23-08-2017 - Trust Fund Administration Agreement between the Government of the Swiss Confederation and the International Bank for Reconstruction and Development and the International Development Association concerning the Government Debt and Risk Management Multi-Donor Trust Fund (TF 071685)
fr: Amendment No 1 to Supplemental Agreement between the Government of the Swiss Confederation and the International Bank for Reconstruction and Development and the International Development Association regarding the Government Debt and Risk Management Multi-Donor Trust Fund (Trust Fund No. TF072660, parallel to original Trust Fund No. TF071685)  - 23-08-2017 - Accord entre la Suisse, représentée par le SECO, et la Banque mondiale concernant le fonds pour le remboursement de la dette publique et la gestion de risque
